trans-unit.source: Provides information about a user's capabilities to view and modify personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre os recursos de um usuário para exibir e modificar os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: At various points in the life cycle of a Web Parts application, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object needs to check the capabilities of the current user to determine what personalization data the user can view and modify.
trans-unit.target: Em vários pontos no ciclo de vida de um aplicativo de Web Parts, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> objeto precisa verificar os recursos do usuário atual para determinar que o usuário pode exibir e modificar os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: When this need arises, the personalization object checks instances of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa necessidade, o objeto de personalização verifica instâncias de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts personalization feature defines two user capabilities, each of which is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> object.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de personalização de Web Parts define dois recursos de usuário, cada um dos quais é representada por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Both of these objects have corresponding verbs that can be used to specify user capabilities within the `<authorization>` section of a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Esses objetos têm verbos correspondentes que podem ser usados para especificar os recursos de usuário dentro do `<authorization>` seção de um arquivo Web. config.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [autorização elemento para personalização de Web Parts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).

trans-unit.source: The different user capabilities are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de usuário diferentes são mostrados na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: User capability
trans-unit.target: Recurso de usuário

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the current user can save personalization data to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o usuário atual pode salvar os dados de personalização para o repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.
trans-unit.target: Acessados por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> campo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the current user can enter Shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o usuário atual pode inserir o escopo de personalização compartilhado.

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.
trans-unit.target: Acessados por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability> campo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class has one public property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> classe tem uma propriedade pública.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A> property indicates the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A> propriedade indica o nome da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class also has two exposed methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> classe também tem dois métodos expostos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A> method allows two user capability objects to be compared.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A> método permite que os dois objetos de recurso de usuário a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The objects are considered equal if they have the same name.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são considerados iguais se tiverem o mesmo nome.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A> method generates a hash code based on the name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A> método gera um código de hash com base no nome do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a name for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém um nome para o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> object, or has the same <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> atual ou tem o mesmo valor de <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> or has the same <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="o" /> for igual ao <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> atual ou tiver o mesmo valor de <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" />.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash do inteiro assinado de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string value identifying the class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor de cadeia de caracteres que identifica a classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that identifies the class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que identifica a classe.
